translation.AnswerLandingHelp: You will use your camera and microphone to record your answers. Please make sure you are in a quiet location and have 5-10 minutes of free time.
translation.AnswerLandingTypeEmail: Type your e-mail address to start.
translation.AnswerLandingContact: You will be contacted back at this address.
translation.AnswerLandingNotFound: The questionnaire you requested is invalid or has expired.
translation.AnswerLandingPleaseCheckLink: Please check the link that you have been provided.
